description: Cadillac boat is 1955.  Has two swivel seats. Humminbird depth finder with temperature.  Rod holders. Bow and Stern light.  All new paint inside and outside the boat so it looks new.  Trailer has fresh paint, new lights and wiring.  Wheel bearing and seals were gone through and are good to go as are the tires.  The motor is a 1955 Johnson 5.5 HP.  It has been stored for 25 years inside a garage.  I replaced the water pump/impellor, rebuilt the carb with new jets, gaskets, and float.  This motor has also been converted to a modern fuel tank system with a brand new fuel pump so it does not have to use the two line, pump up, pressure tank that was original in those days.  The motor starts and runs great.  Don't be afraid of the age of this motor.  It has very few hours on it from the original owner who I bought it from.  He used it a couple years and then moved on to larger boats and motors which is why he put it in his garage for so long.  I was surprised to find how readily available parts are for these old motors in case you need anything. This would be a great starter boat for anyone who does not want to put a lot of money into something.  The only thing you may need would be a spare tire and rim since I don't have one for it and a small battery to run the depth finder.  Call or Text if interested and make me an offer. show contact info

description: Selling my 1978 StarCraft super sport 16 foot boat. Has a 50hp Mercury outboard. Overall it's in usable condition as just a fishing boat. It does need a little work the diaphragms in the carburators need replaced it starves for fuel over 3/4 throttle after a while. It needs a battery. The seats and vinyl have seen better days. The Floors are still solid. This spring it got a complete new wiring harness on the engine. Replaced both carburator floats, new water pump, new gear oil, new spark plugs, primer bulb and hose with an in line fuel filter.  trailer bearings were repacked and bearing buddies added. Brand new tires on the trailer. All new light bulbs in all lights. Registration until 2019. It comes with 2 6 gallon fuel tanks, lowrance sonar graph, battery box, some tools, a board to mount pole holders on the back, muffs to hook the house up and run it, Rockford fosgate marine head unit I planned to put in it. Life jackets, any extra parts I have (there's a whole tote full of miscellaneous items that comes with it) A pile of receipts and records (been in my family a long time). I may even throw in a good fishing story or two. Was fixing it to be a family boat. Plans have changed must sell it now. I'm willing to entertain any reasonable offer. $1500 obo
